mainHero.title: Retro//vrs
mainHero.subtitle: Luxury Asset Hub
mainHero.description: The first web3 Luxury Asset Hub that grants lifetime equity to luxury consumers through the collections they currently own, while fully monetizing their assets via multiple revenue streams.
mainHero.description1: We offer trust to collectors who resale and/or purchase through the asset hub via an embedded, completely transparent and secure authentication process that protects the community from counterfeit transactions.

assetHub.title: Asset Hub
assetHub.description: A Luxury Asset Hub is a platform dedicated to the trade and management of high-end physical and digital luxury goods, providing services such as authentication, resale, rental and data monetization. The term “hub” emphasizes the central role it plays in bringing together buyers, sellers, collectors, researchers, and authenticators in a convenient, efficient, and secure manner.
assetHub.description1: Our vision is to put the power into the hands of the consumers through not only equitable sales and resales, but also through ownership and management of your personal data in a decentralized way, while also protecting the environment by making it easier, safer and more alluring to purchase pre-owned luxury

items.title: Retro//fit: 3D Capture
items.description: Using your mobile phone, easily turn photos of your luxury assets into high‑quality 3D digital twins that are optimized for AR.  Photogrammetry is used to turn a series of pictures taken on your phone into a 3D model.

items.title: Retro//twin: Authentication Certificate
items.description: The authenticity certification of the luxury asset is secured in the form of 3D digital twin. It is attached to the object itself; not to an event, a paper, a QR code or a chip. It enables digital traceability and transparency of the authenticated luxury assets.

items.name: Photogrammetry
items.description: Turn photos from your phone into high‑quality 3D models that are optimized for AR. What is needed is a series of well-lit photographs taken from many different angles. It analyzes the overlap area between different images to match up landmarks, and then produces a 3D model of the photographed object.

items.name: Peer verification
items.description: Digital Twin enables authentication to be completed using a one of a kind secure process.  RETRO//VRS is the only luxury resale space in the market that uses a unique and completely transparent 3 layer verification process to ensure the accuracy of digital authentications.  Artificial Intelligence, machine learning, image mining, RETRO//VRS’ network of certified authentication experts, P2P legit check, just to name drop a few.

items.name: Cross-chain
items.description: Blockchain interactions require gas fees which suggests that it can become quite expensive to operate a metaverse platform. A cross-chain is the interoperability between two relatively independent blockchains. In other words, it allows blockchains to speak to one another because they’re built in a standardized way. This interoperability allows the high volume transactions to be handled in low/zero gas fee chain.

items.name: Metaverse
items.description: In the simplest of nutshells, the metaverse is "a whole new 3D interactive internet". The emergence of the metaverse offers incredible potential for fashion and luxury industry. As fashion immerses itself in the metaverse, it can be separated into two forms: the combination of physical and digital, where clothing can be worn using augmented or virtual realities, and fully digital, where items are sold directly to an avatar.

testflight.title: Retro//crowd
testflight.description: A community-driven platform that connects luxury collectors with pre-owned luxury buyers. Collectors can share their knowledge and experience about their collection, while buyers can ask questions and access information to make informed decisions.
